dropzone.Dropzone.invalidSizeLessError.developer_comment: A message shown when a file with less than minimum allowed size is being uploaded in Dropzone.

dropzone.Dropzone.invalidSizeMoreError.developer_comment: A message shown when a file with more than maximum allowed size is being uploaded in Dropzone.

dropzone.Dropzone.invalidType.developer_comment: A message shown when a file with wrong MIME type is being uploaded.
dropzone.Dropzone.invalidType.string: The file type must be {count, plural, one {{typeString} file} other {one of {typeString} files}}.

dropzone.Dropzone.multipleDraggedError.developer_comment: A message shown when multiple files are dragged over Dropzone.

dropzone.Dropzone.unexpectedValidationEr.developer_comment: A message shown in case file validation in Dropzone component for unknown reason.
dropzone.Dropzone.unexpectedValidationEr.string: An unexpected problem occured during file validation. Please try again.

dropzone.Dropzone.uploadError.developer_comment: A message shown in case file upload in Dropzone component results in an error.
dropzone.Dropzone.uploadError.string: A problem occured while uploading your file. Please try again.

pgn.Alert.closeLabel.developer_comment: Label of a close button on Alert component

pgn.CardCarousel.scrollToNext.developer_comment: Accessibility text describing the action for navigating a scrollable carousel to the next element

pgn.CardCarousel.scrollToPrevious.developer_comment: Accessibility text describing the action for navigating a scrollable carousel to the previous element

pgn.ChipCarousel.scrollToNext.developer_comment: Accessibility text describing the action for navigating a scrollable carousel to the next element

pgn.ChipCarousel.scrollToPrevious.developer_comment: Accessibility text describing the action for navigating a scrollable carousel to the previous element

pgn.DataTable.BaseSelectionStatus.clearS.developer_comment: A label of clear all selection button.

pgn.DataTable.BaseSelectionStatus.select.developer_comment: A label for select all button.
Text for selected label when table is paginated

pgn.DataTable.ExpandAll.collapseAllLabel.developer_comment: Label of an action button that collapses all expandable rows of DataTable.

pgn.DataTable.ExpandAll.expandAllLabel.developer_comment: Label of an action button that expands all expandable rows of DataTable.

pgn.DataTable.FilterStatus.clearFiltersT.developer_comment: A text that appears on the `Clear filters` button

pgn.DataTable.RowStatus.statusText.developer_comment: A text describing how many rows is shown in the table

pgn.DataTable.SidebarFilters.title.developer_comment: Title for the sidebar filters component

pgn.Dropzone.DefaultContent.fileSizeBetw.developer_comment: A message shown when uploaded file's size must be in given range.

pgn.Dropzone.DefaultContent.fileSizeMax.developer_comment: A message shown when uploaded file's size must be more than some value.

pgn.Dropzone.DefaultContent.fileSizeMin.developer_comment: A message shown when uploaded file's size must be more than some value.

pgn.Dropzone.DefaultContent.fileTypeRest.developer_comment: A message shown when uploaded file must be of certain type(s).
pgn.Dropzone.DefaultContent.fileTypeRest.string: Upload {count, plural, one {{firstPart} files} other {{firstPart} or {secondPart} files}}

pgn.Dropzone.DefaultContent.label.developer_comment: A text that appears as a label for input of Dropzone component.
pgn.Dropzone.DefaultContent.label.string: Drag and drop your file here or click to upload.

pgn.Dropzone.UploadProgress.cancelLabel.developer_comment: Label of a cancel button that is shown during file upload in Dropzone component.

pgn.Dropzone.UploadProgress.uploadLabel.developer_comment: A text that is shown near a progress bar during file upload in Dropzone component.

pgn.FormAutosuggest.iconButtonClosed.developer_comment: A message shown in case when the autosuggest menu is opened.

pgn.FormAutosuggest.iconButtonOpened.developer_comment: A message shown in case when the autosuggest menu is closed.

pgn.ProductTour.Checkpoint.bottom-positi.developer_comment: Screen-reader message to notify user that they are located at the bottom of the product tour step.

pgn.ProductTour.Checkpoint.top-position-.developer_comment: Screen-reader message to notify user that they are located at the bottom of the product tour step.
